narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA, pending the inspection at the other sites.  
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part once all sites have passes Re-license. 
If you have not received your license within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
